name: Gods of the Fallen Land
description: Gods of the Fallen Land is an action-strategy game centered around base building and villager management. Take on the role of a leader trying to rebuild humanity in a broken and dangerous world. Lead your followers into battle and make strategic decisions on what to develop and build to survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 3.2 GHz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card 2 GB Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Rough guideline, based on limited testing and the development system.
